payload.text: As your BT Super account is transferring to Mercer Super, the limited service period is in place from 17 March 2023, 5pm (Sydney time) to 1 May 2023, 11.59pm (Sydney time). For more information, select the ‘BT Super merger into Mercer Super’ button.
